name: Nov Run
description:
Nov Run is a sci-fi themed endless runner where escape a uniquely themed space station.

Play to unlock Ghost, Goldfish, Cathode, Earthchan and Axios!

Share your score on the daily and alltime scoreboard!

Here is a link to the template that contains the source code (except for stuff like intro, skin changing and some powerups), so you can build your own endless runner:

https://github.com/NovemberDev/novemberdev-endless-runner-tutorial
